title: DHFWS Purba Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Community Health Officer Posts
description: District Health and Family Welfare Society (DHFWS) Purba Bardhaman has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 04 vacancies for Community Health Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BAMS can grab this chance and apply for the DHFWS Purba Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online before the...
